Gautam Sharma

People Person · Traveler · Fitness and Food Enthusiast

I am an experienced technology finance and strategy professional with experience in investor relations, M&As, and post-acquisition brand consolidation. I started my career in international software sales wherein I led multiple sales teams and closed business opportunities with several Fortune 500 companies. Having worked both internationally and in the US, I have learned unique cross-cultural business capabilities that have enabled me to lead projects and teams all over the world.

Experience

Investment banking Summer Associate

Jefferies LLC

Actively contributed to key business projects as a part of the Tech-Enabled Services group and performed financial valuation, discounted cash flow, and multiples-based analysis. Prepared pitchbooks and live deal materials and conducted industry and product research.

May 2022 - August 2022

Chief of Staff to CEO

Ebix Inc

Led strategy for integrating 27 acquisitions into a new Fintech brand launch in India (Deal Size: $800M) and created framework to assist marketing and PR teams with the rebranding of future acquisitions. Developed and implemented Covid-19 cost-reduction strategy that achieved its target of cutting $5M within 120 days.

September 2017 - July 2021

Senior Enterprise Solutions Consultant

Ebix Inc

Surpassed the yearly sales quota by 67% by negotiating and winning new enterprise software deals worth more than $1M as a part of the Ebix Risk Compliance Services division. Built and trained a 6-member offshore sales team focused on risk management services that developed $8M prospective client pipeline leading to conversion rate of 20% within the first 12 months.

October 2015 - August 2017

Manager, International Business Development

Ebix Inc

Drove a team of 8 assistant managers for international sales of a newly acquired $66M healthcare division by defining team vision, operations, and processes and measured performance while providing training and coaching. Led a tenfold improvement culminating in $5M revenue across 10 new countries within 12 months and won the annual company award for International Sales Excellence.

May 2012 - September 2015

University of Jammu

Master of Business Administration

Top 10 among 214 candidates, Dean's Best Thesis Award for Summer Internship

Interests

I am an avid traveler and have traveled to more than 25 countries. Apart from traveling, I really enjoy working out, cooking, and watching comedy shows.

When I have time, I also like to engage in community service and have been actively engaged in different community initiatives such as food access for the poor, fighting homelessness, and empowering teenagers via sports. I am a novice yogi too.
